text: Kogda postignet cheloveka kakoye - libo neschastiye, on molitsya togda Gospodu svoyemu, obrashchayas' k Nemu s raskayaniyem; a posle togo, kogda On nadelit yego Svoyeyu milost'yu, on zabyvayet o tom, o chem on prezhde molilsya Yemu, i naravne s Bogom chtit kumiry, chtoby uklonit' drugikh ot puti Yego. Skazhi: "Uslazhdaysya svoyeyu neblagodarnost'yu nenadolgo: so vremenem ty budesh' v chisle stradayushchikh v ogne
